data.prayer: Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Ayre, Isle of Man.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ayre, Isle of Man

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Ayre, Isle of Man not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Ayre.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Ayre.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Lezayre
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Lezayre, Ayre, Isle of Man.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Ayre, Isle of Man a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Ayre.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 4,130 cultural Christians in the state of Ayre to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'
